metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28948 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue in the Unmarshal function in Go-Yaml v3 causes the program to crash when attempting to deserialize invalid input.

notes.Note: jdstrand> snapd contains an embedded copy of golang-goyaml sbeattie> according to upstream, this likely only affects v3 implementations only PoC in revoked snyk report mdeslaur> only affects yaml.v3, not yaml.v2

criterions.comment: golang-gopkg-yaml.v3 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
snapd package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
